name: ChartPointsCollection
description: A collection of all the chart points within a series inside a chart.

info.title: Office JavaScript Add-in API
info.description: Office JavaScript Add-in API for June fork

properties.name: count
properties.description: Returns the number of chart points in the collection.

methods.name: getItemAt
methods.description: Retrieve a point based on its position within the series.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: Index value of the object to be retrieved. Zero-indexed.
